# shared

**Type Property**

Returns the shared [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSHelpManager] instance, creating it if it does not already exist.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class var shared: NSHelpManager { get }
```

## Return Value

Shared help manager.
